706791f-a.title: Brooklyn: Shore Road - 97th Street
706791f-a.text:
Shore Road, east side, between 97th and 99th Streets. Iu 1890 on
the Robinson's mape of Eings County, the homes in this view were on the Estate
of Henry Stanton. The Estate of A. W. Johnson was south of the Stanton Estate
and west ot Shore Road. The house in the foreground is the original Stanton
Souse.
About 1920.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MMAY BE REPRODUCED.
